body:

[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1563611/spack-build.out.txt)

### System Information

I guess this is obvious from the pasted build results, but I encountered this error on:

* darwin-highsierra-x86_64
* clang-9.0.0-apple

I do not believe I have any relevant, machine-specific configuration like `packages.yaml` etc...
title: Installing vanilla mesa fails on OSX
